text: I've reached a milestone in my wpidentity project. It's now a package, and can be included in other servers. There's also an interface for browser-based clients to call through the server to wordpress.com. I've got a couple of simple demo apps running. Thinking of hooking it up to "Drummer" and/or "FeedLand". It's a richer interface to WordPress content than I've had, in the past I was limited to what the XML-RPC api could do (and it could do a lot and I appreciate how they've kept it running over the years). Apparently this is using the same API that their web client, Calypso, uses. I have some definite ideas, but it's time for me to take a break from developement for a few days, off to schmooze with old Berkmanites. It's been 20 years since I showed up there, believe it or not.
